result.title: Convergence
result.content:
768C - Джон Сноу и его любимое число

After performing the operation more than 5 times every squence I tried starts alternating: answer for k = 5 is same as for k = 7,9.., same for k = 6, 8....

Does every squence converge to such alternating state? If it does, for what k and why?
